definition: having words written out in full by hand, rapid handwriting in which letters are set down in full and are cursively connected within words without lifting the writing implement from the paper
details:
adjective
- having words written out in full by hand
= example: having words written out in full by hand
noun
- rapid handwriting in which letters are set down in full and are cursively connected within words without lifting the writing implement from the paper
= synonyms: cursive
